channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: My favorite iPhone Air case just hit its lowest price ever for Black Friday on Amazon
item.description: Save big on the Apple Bumper Case for Black Friday - up to 29% off.

item.title: 10 Burning Questions We Still Have After ‘Wicked: For Good’
item.description: The 'Wicked' follow-up starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande is now in theaters.

item.title: Altman describes OpenAI’s forthcoming AI device as more peaceful and calm than the iPhone
item.description: Altman and Ive tease a simple AI device aimed at calm, distraction-free computing, launching within two years.

item.title: The tiny Mac mini gets a big price cut in this year's Black Friday sales
item.description: The Apple Mac mini (M4) is compact yet powerful, and now it's down to $479 at Best Buy for Black Friday.

item.title: Can you trust cheap big-screen Black Friday TVs? As a TV expert, I’d pick these 6
item.description: There are great deals to be found in the Black Friday sales on the largest TVs, but not all are worth it. Here's what to look for in the specs to make sure you get a great big-screen value.

item.title: I've been tracking Black Friday prices all month — these are the 150+ best deals on phones, laptops, TVs, appliances and more
item.description: Black Friday is on November 28 and Cyber Monday on December 1, which means you have just 6 days before the year's biggest sale ends – don't miss out on these top tech deals.

item.title: Meta’s new wearables trade-in program gives you Ray-Ban and Oakley discounts
item.description: For the first time, Meta is offering trade-in discounts for its smart glasses with a pilot program that’s only running through December 31st. According to a legal page on Meta’s website, trade-in discounts can be applied to the Ray-Ban Meta Gen 1, Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2, Oakley Meta HSTN, and Oakley Meta Vanguard. Notably, the […]

item.title: Dyson's 2-in-1 vacuum-mop just sunk to a new cheapest-ever price – $300 off
item.description: The V15s Detect Submarine can take care of all your floor cleaning needs, and it's cheaper than ever.

item.title: OpenAI learned the hard way that Cameo trademarked the word ‘cameo’
item.description: OpenAI might have to rename the "cameo" feature in the Sora app.

item.title: Experts tried to get AI to create malicious security threats - but what it did next was a surprise even to them
item.description: Experiments find LLMs can create harmful scripts, although real-world reliability failures prevent them from enabling fully autonomous cyberattacks today.

item.title: I found 7 DJI deals worth shopping for Black Friday
item.description: Here are eight DJI deals that are already available to shop for Black Friday. Save on the Mic Mini, DJI Osmo 360, and DJI Mini 4K.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson Will Star in Mike Flanagan’s ‘Exorcist’ Reboot
item.description: The 'Jurassic World Rebirth' star has joined the next film in the horror franchise, this time coming from 'The Haunting of Hill House' creator Mike Flanagan.

item.title: 80+ Black Friday deals: We found best-ever prices on MacBooks, AirPods, Kindles, and Ninja appliances
item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: The 4 ‘Stranger Things’ Episodes the Duffers Suggest You Rewatch
item.description: 'Stranger Things 5' is out this week on Netflix, so your window to prepare is dwindling.

item.title: This stunning LG Ultragear gaming monitor has hit its best-ever price for Black Friday — save over $800 at Amazon
item.description: Get the best gaming monitor deal. The 45-inch LG Ultragear gaming monitor is on sale for $896.99 in the Amazon Black Friday sale.

item.title: Watch Disneys new AI-powered Olaf robot wander around Arendelle
item.description: Disneyland Paris is getting a new robotic resident, a next-gen animatronic Olaf that uses machine learning to interact with guests.

item.title: A Nasty Brain Illness Is Spreading Quickly Among Horses in the U.S. Here’s What You Need to Know
item.description: At least 29 cases of equine herpes myeloencephalopathy have been detected in seven states so far.

item.title: Yes, Pop Mart is having a Black Friday sale: Spend $300, save $100 on select Labubus and more
item.description: Pop Mart's Black Friday sale is live. The only Labubu deals so far fall under the spend $300, save $100 deal, but more coupons are coming.
